page.title: 07 OLD HALL
page.content: There are 600 acres at Old Hall belonging to Mr Sexton. This includes Rumley Wood, Old Hall(which is supposed to have conections with the super natural) a moat and ponds. The moat used to surround Old Hall but doesn't any longer. Old Hall is a two storey building. It has sixteenth century chimney stacks with two octaganal shafts. Mr Sexton breeds pheasants which lay between 10 and 12 eggs. In earlier days, the eggs were almost an industry. In the middle of the pond there is an island where the birds. Rumley Wood ,situated nearby, is a large wood which is full of wildlife and nesting birds. There are a couple of guard dogs, both of them are Alsations.
